directions: Heat butter and olive oil in a large saucepan over medium-low heat and cook onion and garlic until onion is soft and translucent, about 5 minutes. Add tomatoes, water, sugar, salt, pepper, red pepper flakes, celery seed, and oregano. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 15 minutes.
Remove from heat and puree with an immersion blender. Reheat soup until warm and season with more salt and pepper if desired.
ingredients: 2 large garlic cloves, peeled and crushed
1 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste
freshly ground black pepper to taste
title: Simple Tomato Soup
